Package game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Behaviour
    A factory for creating actions.
    ZombieWorld
    An Actor of the ZombieWorld game implements these interfaces to determine the type of Zombie Actor, whether an Actor that has limbs can have its limbs knocked off and determine whether it is able to revive itself after being killed.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Application
    The main class for the zombie apocalypse game.
    AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    AttackBehaviour
    A class that generates an AttackAction if the current Actor is standing next to an Actor that they can attack.
    ConsumeAction
    Special action to consume food by the actor The implementation of this class so player or damage human can consumed food and healed them as an ConsumeAction.
    Corpse
    A Corpse that refers to a dead actor.
    CraftingWeaponAction
    A special action to craft weapon.
    Crop
    A class of Crop A class that implements Crop which can be farmed by farmer and harvest by both player and farmer when it is ripe.
    Dirt
    A class that represents bare dirt.
    DropLimbAction
    Drops a Limb to the ground.
    Farmer
    Class representing an ordinary Farmer.
    FarmingBehaviour
    A class of Farming Behaviour The implementation of this class is to allowed Farmer to sow a crop when the Farmer is standing besides a dirt.
    Fence
    An impenetrable barrier.
    FertiliseBehaviour
    A class of Fertilise Behaviour The implementation of this class is to allow farmer to feritilise the Crop when he/she is standing on the Crop.
    FollowBehaviour
    A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
    Food
    A class of Food.
    HarvestBehaviour
    A class of HarvestBehaviour.
    Human
    Class representing an ordinary human.
    HuntBehaviour
    Returns a MoveAction that will take the Actor closer to the nearest instance of a target class.
    Limb
    A Limb.
    Limbs
    A Collection of Limb objects.
    PickUpItemBehaviour
    A factory for creating picking up actions.
    Plank
    A primitive weapon.
    Player
    Class representing the Player.
    PortableItem
    Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.
    Tree
    A tree that starts as a sapling and grows into a large tree.
    WanderBehaviour
    Allows an Actor to wander around at random.
    Zombie
    A Zombie.
    ZombieActor
    Base class for Actors in the Zombie World
    ZombieArm
    A Zombie's arm.
    ZombieClub
    A class of ZombieClub A primitive Weapon that is crafted with zombie's arm
    ZombieLeg
    A Zombie's Leg.
    ZombieMace
    A class of ZombieMace.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TypeOfLimb
    This enum class seeks to define the type of limbs that exists in the ZombieWorld.
    TypeOfZombieActor
    This enum class seeks to define the type of Zombie Actors currently in the ZombieWorld.
    ZombieCapability  
    ZombieMobility
    The Mobility of a ZombieActor.
